Articles.Content:
The U-2 was one of the more well known of all of the CIA's spyplanes. Now you too can explode in spectacular fashion while the wings are being ripped off.

It uses only stock parts.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32762[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32763[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32764[/ATTACH]

Download -

U-2A.craft (Mediafire)

Edited September 10, 2012 by blackout11c
I case anyone is wondering, I have got it up to 10,000m and 215m/s (while not at the same time)
P.S. the wings only got ripped off when Mechjeb conducted a high (10+) G roll without me there:mad:

Oh yeah blame mechjeb!

He is a robot, so give him all your hate, he wont feel a thing!
